did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: The Debra S. Clatterbuck Collection, 1861-1866, consists of three document facsimiles pertaining to the Henkle's of Pendleton County, West Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Clatterbuck, Debra S. Collection, 1861-1866, SC# 2083, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Debra S. Clatterbuck signed a depository agreement November 11, 1989; that agreement was terminated October 31, 2001, with photocopies remaining in Special Collections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photocopies of three documents relevant to the settling of the estate of Michael Henkle of Pendleton County. Two documents date from 1861: one specifies the monetary conditions for the sale of Henkle's belongings, the other for the sale of Henkle's slaves. The third document, dated 1866, is a receipt from the Pendleton County clerk apparently to settle the estate record.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The facsimilies are arranged chronologically in one folder.
